name: squishy squid
notes:
with this pattern, you will be able to make as many baby squids as you want. this is the perfect project for advanced beginner crocheters.

you will receive two pdf (english & french).

difficulty
advanced beginner

skills required
crocheting in spiral, magic ring, chain, slip stitch, single crochet stitch, half double crochet stitch, double crochet stitch, increasing and decreasing.

materials

about 11g of #6 bulky yarn weight, (you can use any yarn for this project). suggested yarns: parfait chunky, honey bunny, baby snuggle, himalayan dolphin, paintbox chenille.., etc.
4mm crochet hook
10mm safety eyes
polyester fiberfill for stuffing
yarn needle, scissors, stitch markers

final size
they are about 8 cm (3.5”) high when made with indicated yarn.
